bibl.title: The Gods of Karanis Or Heron Is Not Heron. New Images, and New and Old Texts.
bibl.note: New images [paintings from Karanis published in: Al-Fann al Misri. 3 (Cairo 1976) pp. 1526-1527, pl. 1083 A and B]. - Who are the figures represented here? - The two men in military dress or Heron is not Heron. New and old texts.
bibl.seg: Cornelia Römer, The Gods of Karanis Or Heron Is Not Heron. New Images, and New and Old Texts.

New images [paintings from Karanis published in: Al-Fann al Misri. 3 (Cairo 1976) pp. 1526-1527, pl. 1083 A and B]. - Who are the figures represented here? - The two men in military dress or Heron is not Heron. New and old texts.
